frames.caption: A black and white image shows two people standing in front of a mirror. The person in the foreground is taking a selfie, partially obscuring their face with a smartphone. The background includes a wooden door and a small lamp on a dresser.
frames.description: The scene is set indoors, likely in a bedroom or living area, with two individuals posing for a mirror selfie. The monochrome filter adds a classic and neutral tone to the image.

frames.caption: A couple poses for a mirror selfie, with the man embracing the woman from behind. The woman holds the phone up to capture the moment, partially obscuring her face.
frames.description: The scene is set indoors, likely in a bedroom or living area, as indicated by the visible furniture. The couple appears relaxed and affectionate, capturing a candid moment together.
